name: Hamburger Cabbage Stir-Fry
ingredients: 1 bunch green onions, cut on the bias (about 8 onions or 3 ounces after trimming)

instructions.en: Brown ground beef with garlic, salt, and pepper in a large skillet or wok. Optionally drain fat.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso s cesnakom, soľou a korením na veľkej panvici alebo woku. Voliteľne zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンまたはワックで挽肉、ニンニク、塩、コショウを炒めて茶色くします。必要に応じて脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Add cabbage and mushrooms, stir-fry until cabbage is tender-crisp.
instructions.sk: Pridajte kapustu a huby, miešajte a smažte, kým kapusta nie je na skus.
instructions.ja: キャベツとマッシュルームを加え、キャベツが歯ごたえのある程度になるまで炒めます。

instructions.en: Add remaining ingredients and heat through. Adjust seasoning to taste.
instructions.sk: Pridajte zvyšné prísady a prehrejte. Upravte ochutenie podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: 残りの材料を加えて温めます。好みに合わせて味を調整します。

notes: Makes 6 servings. You can save money by shredding your own cabbage instead of using pre-packaged coleslaw mix. The author made this dish for about $3.50 using discounted ingredients.
